page.title: 04250th ANNIV. SCHOOL SERVICE
page.content: The festival opened on Ascension Day May 16th.with a service at the church given by the children for parents and friends.It was a sunny spring morning as they arrived by car and coach soon after 9a.m.The church was beautifully decorated with floral arrangements and musical instruments,the windows depicting a musical theme.Music also played a large part in the service, with readings comparing life to playing in an orchestra.The school orchestra of recorders, clarinet, flute, violin, keyboard organ, tuned and untuned percussion accompanied the hymns and Class 3 read Psalm 150.After the service refreshments were enjoyed by children and adults.The children then visited the various exhibitions, which included their own art work, staged in the marquees.They returned to school in time for a picnic lunch.
